contentfulProduct.seoDescription: Our Luxe Down Comforter is made with 700 fill power European white down and baffle box construction to keep it fluffy, warm and evenly distributed
contentfulProduct.title: All-Season Luxe Goose Down Comforter
contentfulProduct.subtitle: Traditional retail price $605

content.value: Our Luxe Down Comforter is made with 700 fill power European white down and baffle box construction to keep it fluffy, warm and evenly distributed. Finished with sturdy, double stitched seams, it will keep you warm and cozy for years and years.
700 fill power European white goose down
100% cotton sateen shell
Responsible Down Standard Certified
Baffle box construction - perfect for year round comfort - keeps comforter lofty and the fill evenly distributed
Double stitched edges with German piping for durability
Corner loops to tie duvet and keep cover in place
Made in the USA of imported materials
Machine wash in cold water, gentle cycle. Use mild detergents only. Tumble dry on lowest heat setting until completely dry. Option to professionally dry clean.

productDetails.productDetails:
• 700 fill power European white goose down
  • 100% cotton sateen shell
  • Responsible Down Standard Certified
  • Baffle box construction - perfect for year round comfort - keeps comforter lofty and the fill evenly distributed
  • Double stitched edges with German piping for durability
  • Corner loops to tie duvet and keep cover in place
  • Made in the USA of imported materials
